title: If you go to Art Basel Miami Beach This Saturday!!!!!
content:
Debbie Millman emailed me this and I have been forwarding it to every one. If you go say hi, I will be the bold head man asking everyone their thoughts on accreditation for graphic designers.

John

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020145613im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Design_Marathon_Evite_F-2_6301.jpg)

author: Alfonso

comments.content:
<cite>…I will be the bold head man asking everyone their thoughts on accreditation for graphic designers.</cite>

Well, I guess that’s one way to make friends…
